name: The Activision Decathlon
overview: The Activision Decathlon is a series of Olympic games similar to the Epyx games series. Up to 2 players in the ColecoVision version can compete in the ten different events of a real-life decathlon, either in sequence or individually. Included are the 100-meter dash, long jump, shot put, high jump, 400-meter race, 110-meter hurdles, discus throw, pole vault, javelin throw, and 1500-meter race.
